name: TheAnalogDriftGamingNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Add this skill to your Alexa to hear gaming news and information including new releases, sales and general thoughts. Content is delivered daily and up to date. Participate in the conversation by contact me @PlatinumDragon7 on most social media outlets, including Twitter.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
